headline: b'After Gun Control Marches, \xe2\x80\x98It\xe2\x80\x99ll Go Away\xe2\x80\x99 vs. \xe2\x80\x98We Are Not Cynical Yet\xe2\x80\x99'
snippet: b'Advocates as well as opponents of gun control, both plotting next steps after the March for Our Lives rally, think their adversaries will eventually tire.'

headline: b'Remington\xe2\x80\x99s Bankruptcy Stalls Ruling in Sandy Hook Families\xe2\x80\x99 Suit'
snippet: b'The case, amid a reinvigorated debate over guns, has been closely watched as it tries to pierce the legal shield protecting gun companies from lawsuits.'

headline: b'They Tried to Boycott Facebook, Apple and Google. They Failed.'
snippet: b'People are increasingly calling for boycotts of the big tech companies amid a backlash. The problem is that Facebook, Apple, Amazon and Google are nearly inescapable.'
